summary: The diff adds a new read-only Audience (spectator) screen reachable from navigation and implements live updates via React Query polling with loading/error handling. No clear BuildRequest requirements are missing based on the provided diff summary, though some unrelated UI copy/attribution appears to have been introduced or modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai including the text “Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai”.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-10/REQ-11 (Audience spectator view + polling). This appears as additional user-facing content unrelated to the spectator view requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Hard-coded header subtitle text: “2 Bidders • 10 Players • 10 CR Budget”.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-10/REQ-11; this is additional UI copy outside the Audience screen requirements.
